Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.name: setTextPositionWithRespectToImage(tabBar:atIndex:)
Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.abstract: decide where to display the text in the collection view. Default: belowImage

Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.name: setItemBackgroundColor(tabBar:atIndex:)
Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.abstract: set the Background color of Item at index. Default: groupTableViewBackground

Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.name: setItemTextColor(tabBar:atIndex:)
Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.abstract: set the text color of Item at index.

Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.name: setSelectedItemColor(tabBar:atIndex:)
Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.abstract: set the selected item text color of Item at index.

Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.name: setItemTextFont(tabBar:atIndex:)
Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.abstract: set the item text color of Item at index.

Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.name: seperatorColor(tabBar:)
Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.abstract: set the color of the seperator. Default: White

Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.name: containerViewBackgoundImage(tabBar:)
Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.abstract: set ContainerView Background image to view it animations

Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.name: containerViewBackgoundColor(tabBar:)
Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.abstract: set ContainerView Background color to view it animations

Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.name: animationType(tabBar:)
Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.abstract: set animation used while changing from viewcontroller to another. Default: .none

Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.name: TACustomTabBarControllerDelegate
Protocols/TACustomTabBarControllerDelega.abstract: This is the Controller Delegate. It should be implemented in order to set the position of the text with respect to the image.

Enums/AnimationType.html.name: AnimationType
Enums/AnimationType.html.abstract: Animation used while changing from viewcontroller to another.

Enums/ItemTextPosition.html.name: ItemTextPosition
Enums/ItemTextPosition.html.abstract: Text position with respect to the image.

Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.name: containerView
Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.abstract: Container view were all the view controllers will be displayed. Get only

Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.name: selectedIndexPath
Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.abstract: IndexPath of the current selected item. Get only

Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.name: tabBar
Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.abstract: The tab Bar collection view. Get Only

Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.name: tabBarHeight
Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.abstract: Height of the tabBar. Set and Get available

Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.name: setViewControllers(viewControllers:)
Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.abstract: set the View Controllers to be added to the tabBar Controller and shown in the tabBar

Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.name: setStartingViewController(viewController:)
Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.abstract: set starting view controller. if not implemnted, view controller at first index will be taken.

Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.name: jumpToStartingViewController()
Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.abstract: display the starting view controller on the screen

Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.name: selectItem(atIndex:)
Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html#/s.abstract: Select any item at a specific index

Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html.name: TACustomTabBarController
Classes/TACustomTabBarController.html.abstract: TACustomTabBarController can be used insead of the default tab bar contoller. It has some additional features such as text position with respect to the icon, rach tabBar item Background color, text color
